title: Norton Utilities 16.0.2.14 [Multi] [Crack]
description:
Norton Utilities is a software application that comes packed with several tweaking tools designed to help you optimize the overall performance of the computer. 

It sports a clean and straightforward layout that gives users the possibility to perform most operation with minimum effort. 

Norton Utilities provides different tools for helping you enhance the performance of the PC, as you can delete Registry items, remove the free space from the Windows Registry, perform deep or quick defragmentation operations, enable or disable several features (e.g. prioritize foreground applications, speed up the shutdown process), as well as manage which applications load when the computer is tuned on. 

WhatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s more, when it comes to privacy settings, the tool is able to clean the Windows and browsing history, remove third-party software traces, delete free disk space of all the items left by previously delete files, as well as permanently delete files from the computer using the built-in shredder, which makes sure data cannot be recovered with other dedicated tools. 

Other important features worth mentioning are represented by the possibility to recover lost files and apply filters, find duplicate items, restore Registry backups, repair your drives, ninstall unused software tools, and schedule scanning operations. 

All things considered, Norton Utilities comprises a complete suite of tools for helping you find and fix PC problems, speed up PC boot time, protect sensitive data from unauthorized viewing, and perform defragmentation operations. It bundles handy features for making sure your computer runs properly but the ace up its sleeve is the intuitive layout, which makes it an ideal tool even for less experienced users.
